chunks.chunk_text: Hello you guysWelcome to another episode of15 Men's InspirationsYour daily dose of English learning and motivationYou are now listening to JohnAnd in the next 15 minutesWe are going to explore some quotesFrom some of the world's most inspiring figuresNamely Bibi KingErethra FranklinAnd Nina Simone

chunks.chunk_text: Kino LucilleWas rescued from a fireIn Twist, ArkansasIn 1949King learned the nameOf a womanWho caused the fireWas LucilleSo he named his guitarAfter herTo remind himselfNever to fight over a womanOr run into a burning buildingDespite only havingA fifth grade educationKing received honorary doctoratesFrom multiple universitiesHe toured relentlesslyPlaying an averageOf 300 shows a yearWell into his 70s

chunks.chunk_text: 叫做藍調小子也就是Bibi這個縮寫的由來今天他獨特的吉他風格包含了蝴蝶一般的占音還有彎音的技巧呢是來自於他沒有辦法同時唱歌以及同時彈奏吉他所以他讓吉他來唱出音符他最著名的吉他Lucille不是單一把樂器而是他在職業生涯當中使用的一系列的吉普森吉他最初的Lucille是1949年在阿肯色州特威斯特的一場大火當中救出的
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins 名人正念語錄 Inspirations Ep.11 _ 藍調歌王歌后的經典名言 Inspirational quotes from King an.json

chunks.chunk_text: 今天他得知引起火災的女子名字叫做Lucille於是他就用這個名字來為他的吉他命名提醒自己永遠不要為了女人打架或者是衝進燃燒的建築物裡面儘管只有小學五年級的學歷但他獲得了多所大學頒發榮譽博士的學位他不知道疲倦的到處巡迴演出即使70多歲了仍然每年演出300場之多1970年他憑藉著代表作The Thrill Is Gone獲得了首屆的Grammy獎

chunks.chunk_text: 富女全力運動的主題曲她是1987年首位入選搖滾名人堂的女性藝人而且她也曾經在三位總統的就職典禮上面來表演包含了吉米卡特、比爾柯林頓以及巴拉克歐巴馬她在一生當中獲得了18座格萊梅獎全球上面的銷量則超過7500萬張她的故鄉密西根州把她的聲音列為自然資源的一部分儘管事業有成她從1984年
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins 名人正念語錄 Inspirations Ep.11 _ 藍調歌王歌后的經典名言 Inspirational quotes from King an.json

chunks.chunk_text: 開始卻患上了飛行恐懼症從此以後在北美的演出都改搭巴士雖然千里迢迢但是仍然是不畏千里的前進她有故人的音樂記憶力只要聽一遍她就能夠完美的重現歌曲
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins 名人正念語錄 Inspirations Ep.11 _ 藍調歌王歌后的經典名言 Inspirational quotes from King an.json

chunks.chunk_text: Nina Simone, born Eunice Kathleen Wayman in 1933 in Tryon, North Carolina her journey began as a classical pianist she started playing piano at age 3 and practiced Bach, Chopin and Beethoven for hours daily her dreams of becoming the first African-American concert pianist were crushed when she was denied admission to the Curtis Institute
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins 名人正念語錄 Inspirations Ep.11 _ 藍調歌王歌后的經典名言 Inspirational quotes from King an.json

chunks.chunk_text: of Music which she believed was due to racial discrimination to support herself she began playing in a small club in Atlantic City where she was told she had to sing as well as play piano to keep this work secret from a family who considered such music the devil's music she adopted the stage name Nina SimoneNina from a boyfriend's nickname for her and Simone after actress Simone Sinaret her classical training heavily influenced
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins 名人正念語錄 Inspirations Ep.11 _ 藍調歌王歌后的經典名言 Inspirational quotes from King an.json

chunks.chunk_text: her unique playing style often weaving Bach-like counterpoint into jazz standards Simone's music became integral to the civil rights movement with songs like Mississippi Gotham written in response to racial injustices she spoke and sang in several languages including English, French and Hebrew making her a true international artist despite struggling with bipolar disorder and depression throughout her life she recorded over 40 albums
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins 名人正念語錄 Inspirations Ep.11 _ 藍調歌王歌后的經典名言 Inspirational quotes from King an.json

chunks.chunk_text: and became known as the high priestess of soul her distinct voice spanning contralto to soprano and her ability to merge classical jazz, blues, folk and African chants created a unique sound that influenced generations of musicians

chunks.chunk_text: and there you have it guys which one is your favorite Shumin of course Nina Simone Nina Simone I thought so I knew you're going to resonate very well with Nina Simone when I first saw her I thought oh this is what Shumin is going to live by that's your mantra right that's how you live no jazz no life

chunks.chunk_text: you know if you want to do something maybe you're not 100% confident but you have to be confident in your decision making that conscious decision if you're not confident at all don't do it then just skip it so I think that goes with everything in life you know if you make that conscious decision and you made up your mind just go for it don't think about how confident you are just go for it so guys please do send us a comment using the link down below
